Estrella de la tarde brillante de Avalon en Urantia después de la rebelión. <ref>{{lib|LU|67|6|5}}</ref> Universo vecino a Nebadon. <ref>{{lib|LU|32|2|12}}</ref> Seraphim from Avalon trained Nebadon seraphim. <ref>{{lib|LU|38|1|2}}</ref> <ref>{{lib|LU|38|5|1}}</ref> Surgeons from Avalon transferred plasm to Prince’s staff. <ref>{{lib|LU|66|2|7}}</ref> <ref>{{lib|LU|77|2|6}}</ref>
